text: Up the Down Staircase is a 1967 American drama movie directed by Robert Mulligan and was based on the 1964 novel of the same name by Bel Kaufman. It stars Sandy Dennis, Patrick Bedford, Eileen Heckart, Ruth White, Jean Stapleton, Sorrell Brooke, Florence Stanley, Vinnette Carroll and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Up the Down Staircase (movie)
